Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class geometry::point_xy< T >

2D point in Cartesian coordinate system

Template parameters:
  • T numeric type, arguments can be, for example, double, float, int
Examples:

1_point_example.cpp, 3_linestring_example.cpp, 4_polygon_example.cpp, 5_distance_example.cpp, and 6_transformation_example.cpp.
